description: Create a job production plan broadcast message.
permissions: User must provide a job production plan and be authorized to view that job production plan (Pundit job production plan show policy).
side_effects: Creates a broadcast message and sends notifications (email/text) to eligible recipients.
validation_notes: --job-production-plan and --message are required. Summary must be 100 characters or fewer. If --user-ids is provided, each ID must be included in the default recipients for the job production plan.

flags.name: --message
flags.description: Message body (required). Example: Crew arrival moved to 7:30 AM

flags.name: --summary
flags.description: Short summary (max 100 characters). Example: Start time update

flags.name: --user-ids
flags.description: Recipient user IDs (comma-separated or repeated). Example: 12,34
flags.validation: Each ID must be included in the default recipients for the job production plan
